definition: variant of 駕馭|驾驭[jia4 yu4]
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern

sentences.english: Let me give you some examples of how Merrill is riding that next wave.
sentences.chinese: 让我举几个美林如何驾御下一个浪潮的事例。

sentences.english: The German team has shown high leve1s of control and communication between the horse and the rider.
sentences.chinese: 德国队表现了很高的驾御马并与马沟通的水平。

sentences.english: Especially in buying and selling off-season, more to drive every clinch a deal opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 特别是在买卖淡季，更要驾御每个成交的机遇。

sentences.english: I keep that energy reined in, harness it, so that I can ride it even further.
sentences.chinese: 我支配驾御着我的精力，以更好的使用它。

sentences.english: That path should be one that founders can skillfully navigate.
sentences.chinese: 而那条道路应该是创始人能够娴熟驾御的。

sentences.english: I am master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul. (From William Ernest Henley)
sentences.chinese: 我是命运的主人，我能驾御我的灵魂。

sentences.english: Most people in China think thin your government is out to lunch.
sentences.chinese: 许多中国人以为美国政府是由我们美国国民驾御的。

definition: variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
to urge (sb to do do sth)/to drive (sb to take an action)
as the arm moves the finger (idiom)/freely and effortlessly/to have perfect command of
to operate (a machine etc) with ease
to put to work (servant or animal)/to make use of for labor
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
to fly magically through the air
